description:
Seated in the throne of the ruins of Nohal Naha, Erika`s memories are awakened by the jewels. The plans for the nuclear fission device are projected and slowly drawn onto the parchment Kenshin gazes down upon...
Hearing Erika`s heart-rending request to end her life, Kenshiro gently touches a pressure point on Erika`s forehead.
A single tear falls from Kenshiro`s eyes.
"I`ll protect the smile of the girl I see in front of me. That`s a plenty good reason to fight."
His final battle as the 62nd successor to the Divine Fist of the North Star has finally begun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ひとりの少女 エリカ・アレント
